com.defano.jsegue

Class SegueBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jsegue.SegueBuilder

  • public class SegueBuilder
extends Object
    A builder of animated image segues.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Builds an animated segue based on the values provided to the builder.

      Adds an observer of animation frame generation (invoked each time a new frame is rendered).

      Adds an observer of animation completion (invoked when animation is finished)

      • of

        public static SegueBuilder of(SegueName name)
        Create a segue builder for the specified segue name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the effect to build.
        Returns:
        The builder for this segue

      • withSource

        public SegueBuilder withSource(BufferedImage src)
        Set the source image for this segue. If the dimensions of this image do no match that of the destination, the image may be resized to match the larger height/width.
        Parameters:
        src - The source image
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withDestination

        public SegueBuilder withDestination(BufferedImage dst)
        Set the destination image for this segue. If the dimensions of this image do no match that of the destination, the image may be resized to match the larger height/width.
        Parameters:
        dst - The destination image
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withSource

        public SegueBuilder withSource(Paint paint)
        Sets a "paint" source image. May be a solid color, or any Paint subclass including textured paint or gradients. Note that only the source or the destination may be a paint; both cannot be paint.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to use as the source image.
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withDestination

        public SegueBuilder withDestination(Paint paint)
        Sets a "paint" destination image. May be a solid color, or any Paint subclass including textured paint or gradients. Note that only the source or the destination may be a paint; both cannot be paint.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to use as the destination image
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withMaxFramesPerSecond

        public SegueBuilder withMaxFramesPerSecond(int maxFps)
        Sets the maximum number of frames that will be rendered in each second. Note that this specifies only a cap; during real-time animation execution the system may not achieve this rate. Also note that a minimum of three frames are always guaranteed to be created irrespective of this value or duration. See AnimatedSegue.setFps(int)
        Parameters:
        maxFps - Maximum number of frames per second
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withDurationMs

        public SegueBuilder withDurationMs(int durationMs)
        Sets the duration of this animation, in milliseconds. SeeAnimatedSegue.setDurationMs(int)
        Parameters:
        durationMs - The duration of the animation, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withDuration

        public SegueBuilder withDuration(int duration,
                                 TimeUnit unit)
        Sets the duration of this animation, in user-provided units.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of this animation
        unit - The units of time that duration is measured in
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • overlay

        public SegueBuilder overlay(boolean overlayDestination)
        Enables or disables alpha overlay mode in the renderers. See AnimatedSegue.setOverlay(boolean).
        Parameters:
        overlayDestination - True to enable overlay; false to disable.
        Returns:
        This builder object.

      • withAnimationObserver

        public SegueBuilder withAnimationObserver(SegueAnimationObserver observer)
        Adds an observer of animation frame generation (invoked each time a new frame is rendered).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        This builder object

      • withCompletionObserver

        public SegueBuilder withCompletionObserver(SegueCompletionObserver observer)
        Adds an observer of animation completion (invoked when animation is finished)
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer
        Returns:
        This builder object

      • build

        public AnimatedSegue build()
        Builds an animated segue based on the values provided to the builder.

        Note these limitations: - A source and destination must be provided. - Either the source or the destination must be a BufferedImage (cant use two Paints) - If the images are not the same size, they will be resized to the larger dimension.

        Returns:
        The animated segue.
